nodes.text: The PW-12 Plasma Core Sniper Rifle was a model of blaster sniper rifle available during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire.
The PW-12 Plasma Core Sniper Rifle was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of the Core Worlds and Deep Core Explorer Packs, which were released together on May 4, 2015.
